content: **knitted jumper with round yoke in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with garter stitch stripes and short row sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-412 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150-200-200-200 g colour 400 black 100-150-150-150-150-200 g colour 913 winter 50-50-50-50-50-100 g colour 100 off white ------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece knitting gauge 23 stitches in width and 45 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles and circular needle size 3 5 mm lengths 40 cm and 80 cm for the garment drops double pointed needles and circular needle size 3 mm lengths 40 cm and 80 cm for the edges needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
